detail_desc: Top in an airy viscose weave with a V-neck, decorative buttons at the front and narrow, adjustable shoulder straps.
Top in an airy viscose weave with a V-neck, decorative buttons at the front and narrow, adjustable shoulder straps.
Dress in a crinkled cotton weave with a collar, concealed buttons down the front, dropped shoulders and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Rounded hem with an embroidered pattern.
Baby Exclusive. Vest tops in soft, organic cotton jersey with a button placket and ribbing around the neckline and armholes.
Baby Exclusive. Vest tops in soft, organic cotton jersey with a button placket and ribbing around the neckline and armholes.
Wide, knee-length dress in an airy cotton weave with a V-neck and ties at the neckline. 3/4-length, slightly wider sleeves with narrow buttoned cuffs, a seam at the hips and flared skirt. Unlined.
Bucket bag in grained imitation leather with a narrow shoulder strap and drawstring closure. Unlined. Size 12x16x19 cm.
Gilet in supersoft faux fur with a concealed fastening at the top. Lined.
Gilet in supersoft faux fur with a concealed fastening at the top. Lined.
Gilet in supersoft faux fur with a concealed fastening at the top. Lined.
Gilet in supersoft faux fur with a concealed fastening at the top. Lined.
Hooded jacket in soft pile with appliqués and a zip down the front with a chin guard. Unlined.
Hooded jacket in soft pile with appliqués and a zip down the front with a chin guard. Unlined.
Hooded jacket in soft pile with appliqués and a zip down the front with a chin guard. Unlined.
Padded gilet with a detachable faux-fur trimmed hood lined with soft pile. Stand-up collar, side pockets and a zip down the front with a chin guard. Slightly longer and rounded at the back.
Padded gilet with a detachable faux-fur trimmed hood lined with soft pile. Stand-up collar, side pockets and a zip down the front with a chin guard. Slightly longer and rounded at the back.

Short shorts woven in a viscose blend with a high paper bag waist with pleats at the front, a zip fly and concealed hook-and-eye fasteners. Side pockets, fake welt back pockets and a detachable belt with a buckle.
Round-necked T-shirt in slub jersey made from organic cotton with short sleeves and an open chest pocket.
Round-necked T-shirt in slub jersey made from organic cotton with short sleeves and an open chest pocket.

Short dress in soft jersey made from a modal and cotton blend with a V-neck, wrapover front and short sleeves. Seam at the waist with narrow, sewn-in ties that fasten at one side, and a wrapover skirt.

Short dress in soft jersey made from a modal and cotton blend with a V-neck, wrapover front and short sleeves. Seam at the waist with narrow, sewn-in ties that fasten at one side, and a wrapover skirt.

Short dress in soft jersey made from a modal and cotton blend with a V-neck, wrapover front and short sleeves. Seam at the waist with narrow, sewn-in ties that fasten at one side, and a wrapover skirt.

Softshell jacket in windproof, water-repellent functional fabric with folded seams, reflective details and soft fleece inside. Detachable hood with soft fleece inside, a stand-up collar and a zip down the front with a chin guard. Front pockets and elastication at the cuffs. Unlined. The jacket has a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.

Softshell jacket in windproof, water-repellent functional fabric with folded seams, reflective details and soft fleece inside. Detachable hood with soft fleece inside, a stand-up collar and a zip down the front with a chin guard. Front pockets and elastication at the cuffs. Unlined. The jacket has a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.

Rain jacket in wind- and waterproof functional fabric with closed seams. Detachable hood with an elasticated front edge, press-studs down the front and flap front pockets with a press-stud. Elastication at the cuffs and hem. Unlined. The jacket has a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.

Rain trousers in wind- and waterproof functional fabric with welded seams, reflective details and adjustable elastic braces with plastic fasteners. Elastication at the back of the waist, press-studs at the sides, elasticated hems and a reinforced elastic strap under the feet. Unlined. The trousers have a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.

Rain trousers in wind- and waterproof functional fabric with welded seams, reflective details and adjustable elastic braces with plastic fasteners. Elastication at the back of the waist, press-studs at the sides, elasticated hems and a reinforced elastic strap under the feet. Unlined. The trousers have a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.
